answers.answer: Mo any possibility that you might have a food intolerance issue? The fuzzy head or hang-over feeling and nausea etc. can occur when someone has celiac issues, so I'm wondering.
many thanks for taking time to comment, I will contact my GP to do some tests and certainly watch my diet,thanks again,momo

question: I am a otherwise fit 76yr old lady, I have had sickness on and off for over a year,( as a process of elimination I think ) specialist removed my gall bladder which went well. Then about a month later the sickness returned fuzzy head like a hang over (no drink honest!) (not actually sick), Diabetes and cholestrol all good.ifeel pretty rough with the severe nausea feeling, help, any one else feels like this post gall bladder opmo 1934
title: still ill after gall bladder removal
